drill set plan was surprised and

rail settlement plan well ra settlement
plan is uh shared service center uh

to uh the franchise real operators in
the UK we provide those services to
enable a network wide retail proposition
for customers so that uh customers can

and a half thousand stations to any

without having to worry about which
operator Services they're using when we

our applications
uh we indicated to the biders that we

particular the most compelling offers we

we're all using Amazon web services we
later concluded it it was a consequence

complete solutions for Enterprise
applications first and foremost the
business benefit uh we've seen has been
been a dramatic reduction in our
operating costs we've seen a reduction
of of the order of
75% uh between what we were paying uh
for our Legacy applications and what
we'll be paying for the newer
applications uh which is very dramatic
and a lot more than we uh estimated in
our original business case where we we
were thinking in terms of 40% we have
seen secondary benefits we are no longer
facing uh the need to uh refresh
Hardware every 3 years and we no longer

well ahead uh increases in demand for
our services because of the flexibility
that's inherent in the Amazon web
services solution we will be taking a

can I could foresee that we would be uh
uh hosting those in Amazon web services
we're working both with our SI partner

outcome
